amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to the direct provision of defense articles, defense services, and related training to the Kurdistan Regional Government.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 467 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 467 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S1974-1975; text: CR S1975) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to the direct provision of defense articles, defense services, and related training to the Kurdistan Regional Government.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 467 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Blunt.
